page.title: 13Cunnoquhie - By Letham.
page.content: Cunnoquhie is the only estate in our square. It extends to 1100 acres and comprises 3 farms - Cunnoquhie Mill, Countyhall and Collairnie and a total of 10 houses. One of the farms is now rented. Two houses are privately owned and 4 are rented, 26 people live on the estate. Once there were around 20 people working on the estate; nowadays there are 6, with extra help when it is required. The farms grow barley, wheat and oats. They make hay and silage. The oats and hay help to feed the horses, ponies and donkey. The horses are used for racing and hunting and the ponies attend gymkhanas. Peas, beans, potatoes and turnips are also grown and there are bulls, cows, calves, ewes and goats.
